elements.title: About the job
elements.text: Will we be able to teach computers how to cook food? Probably not. But in the meantime, we are a Tech and Data first company; our mission is to modernize and transform the $500 billion restaurant market. Are you intrigued by the challenge of building systems and applications that have a very concrete and tangible real-world application? Then read on, because this might just be the opportunity for you üòé

We want to become the most intelligent kitchen in the world. In order to do that we need to build one of the most remarkable Tech teams in the world. We are a super close team with constant communication. We expect full ownership of features, from finding problems to implementing solutions. We love being questioned and proven wrong so that we can improve, but in return expect full intellectual honesty in mistakes.

Technology and data is key enablement for our success. If you are not only fascinated by delicious food but also state-of-the-art cloud, web, data, and AI technologies, you can't miss this opportunity.

elements.title: What about you:
content: You have 3-10 years of development experience within a Tech startup or organisation.
You have proven experience working with cloud native tech stack, i.e GCP, AWS or Azure.
You are a seasoned backend developer, experienced in  developing and deploying product grade software.
You have good insights about common development processes and lifecycle of software products like PR, code review, continuous integration and delivery, release, etc.
You are not only an excellent individual contributor but also willing to coach and mentor other team members in a respectful way.
You are an expert in at least one of popular programming languages like Node.js, Python, Java, familiar with microservice architecture and corresponding technology, like Docker, Kubernetes, etc.
You have worked cross functionally and especially in an environment where data and tech go hand in hand.
You love to work within a team and pride yourself in your communication skills

elements.title: What about the role:
content: You will work cross functionally with other talented developers across markets in order to deliver the best Kitchen Management System, App and Data insights
You will also coach and mentor other junior team members, not only grow yourself but also entire team
You will work closely with the tech team and help define the way of working, culture and values
You will take end to end responsibility of various components, system to enable hyper growth of the business
You will work collaboratively in order to implement new product features and trouble shoots

elements.title: About the job
elements.text: Do you want to join a fast-paced startup and work on the bleeding edge of recommendation systems, where your work immediately impacts the user experience for millions of users? We are looking for a Senior Fullstack / Backend Engineer who thrives in a fast-moving environment.

elements.title: What you will be building:
elements.text: Recommendation systems that are guaranteed to always show relevant recommendations for any scenario and that are easy to maintain, deploy and improve.

elements.title: We need someone who we can count on to:
content: üôã Own: Improve our recommendation systems for new and existing customers, improve tooling to deploy, introspect and monitor our recommendation systems to constantly make them better.

üíª Teach: What's possible and what's not possible? Tradeoffs between iteration speed and complexity of architecture. How to build a system that is easy to debug and that fails gracefully if there would be changes in the input data.
üéí Learn: Our approach to recommendation systems, data engineering best practices, machine learning basics.
üö¥ Improve: Robustness, performance, and observability of our system, to delight the end-users of our product.

elements.title: We expect you to:
content: Be proficient in Python (or able to quickly learn it)
Care about writing good code
Be comfortable with command line tools
Enjoy architecting and developing solutions to ambiguous problems.

elements.title: Desired skills and qualities
content: Deployed applications using cloud platforms or your own servers
Having worked in a mature data engineering codebases
Experience taking product decisions
Proficiency with cloud computing (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Used Docker, Kubernetes, Argo or similar

elements.title: Within 1 month we expect you to:
content: Understand the ins and outs of how our current recommendation system, data pipelines, and recommendation API works
Have been in several customer calls understanding how they perceive our product
Get to know the team and learn from and collaborate on directing the product development forward
Configure, optimize and measure the performance for newly onboarded e-commerce stores

elements.title: Within 3 months we expect you to:
content: Significantly improve the quality of recommendations using more facets of data impacting the user experience on > 50% of our integrated customers
Generalize our system further, ensuring that recommendations for new customers are perfect from day zero with close to no fine-tuning necessary
Improve our codebase such as adding tests and monitoring of our recommendation's performance

elements.title: Within 6 months we expect you to:
content: Lead focused projects to improve our product further, e.g. relating to model performance, deeper personalization, knowing users across platforms, etc
Have ownership of one or multiple areas in a rapidly growing company
Ensure our codebase supports adding new features in a seamless way

elements.title: Within 12 months we expect you to:
content: Architect new product features and lead the implementation
Contribute to the vision and long-term strategy of our company and product
Start exploring ways to increase our product offering outside of just product recommendations
